channel.title: If you want a website
channel.description:
Not sure if this is the right section but.. I bought a site and not posting the link so Im not advertising and I no longer feel like running it so I have deleted the forums and all so if you need a site PM me. You must meet the following requirments.
-Host a server that is popular. -Be able to control and hold your own. -Finally, don't message me asking me to upload stuff all the time.

item.title: If you want a website
item.dc:creator: @MoparScapePwns MoparScapePwns
